channel.title: A couple of questions to perfect this source?!?!?!?!?
channel.description:
Ok so i am making a server...
and i'm using the zamorak source... if you dont know what it is google it...
How do i remove the ids at the end of npc's item's object's?
can anyone tell me how to remove these annoying numbers?
and how do i remove npc's
and how can i add the new items like Ags=itemid=15333 when i do ::pickup 15333 1 it says error or something
just tell me how to do these things or explain to me how :))))):)))):)))) thanks if you can help fuck off if not .. but thanks for looking anyway...
damn i have to go eat dinner(l0l) Thanks!@#@#%^$%&*&*()_

item.title: A couple of questions to perfect this source?!?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Windfury7 Windfury7
item.description:
@Windfury7 wrote:

ok on some cheap ass servers they have something like this

right click on a item (example)

Choose option

Pickup Rune scmimitar (###*item id
examine rune Scimitar (item id)

how do i remove item id from the choose option menu
???
